start.text: Captain, you better keep your eyes on me~

retreat.text: I'll just go cry in a corner now...

engaged.text: I have just the thing for you!

hull_90.text: That might have stung a little...
Aughhh... they're shooting at me, captain!

hull_50.text: Why's my monitor all red? Help!

overload.text: Ohhh... a thousand error messages just popped on my screen!

death.text: I-I'm sorry! I'll make up for this tonight, captain!

victory.text: Can I please get a hug for that?
Ho ho ho! You better reward me for that, captain~
